about_the_game:
a Ball Rolling Game Of Epic Proportions!



Roll into to levels to gain access to better graphics, more mechanics, and higher-skill gameplay! We expect nothing less than perfection... at least at the end!

features:

these are already going to be in the final release of the game.
  • At least 3 levels of gameplay, each with increasingly good graphics (and soon, settings to turn them back to older graphics for performance)
  • Good music composed by the developers (and potentially, the community)
  • Trading Cards that will be posted as restrictions allow

coming Soon:

these are potential features, nothing is set in stone
  • Different Tilesets
  • Workshop compatibility
  • Level Editor
  • Clear ball with image inside
  • Voice-Activation Mod (For Streamers who want this to be harder)
detailed_description:
a Ball Rolling Game Of Epic Proportions!



Roll into to levels to gain access to better graphics, more mechanics, and higher-skill gameplay! We expect nothing less than perfection... at least at the end!

features:

these are already going to be in the final release of the game.
  • At least 3 levels of gameplay, each with increasingly good graphics (and soon, settings to turn them back to older graphics for performance)
  • Good music composed by the developers (and potentially, the community)
  • Trading Cards that will be posted as restrictions allow

these are potential features, nothing is set in stone

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2-core processor
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 105 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2-core processor
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Storage: 105 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: 4-core processor
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM

  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

name: Rolling Atop It

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2-core processor
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 105 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound (Or None)
  • Additional Notes: this game was made in like 3 days we will make it need more later
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: 4-core processor
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1020 Ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound
  • Additional Notes: FOr Later

short_description: a Ball Rolling Game Of Epic Proportions!Good music, higher-skill gameplay, and enough different rolling mechanics that we might go out of business!
